actions.text: Called up by House by Unanimous Consent.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Voice Vote.
Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment by Voice Vote.

official_title: A concurrent resolution to authorize the Secretary of the Senate to make technical corrections in the enrollment of the bill (S.884) to revise and extend programs to provide price support and production incentives for farmers to assure an abundance of food and fiber, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Makes corrections in the enrollment of S. 884 (Farm price supports).

titles.title: A concurrent resolution to authorize the Secretary of the Senate to make technical corrections in the enrollment of the bill (S.884) to revise and extend programs to provide price support and production incentives for farmers to assure an abundance of food and fiber, and for other purposes.
